name: autoModerationActionExecution
description: This event is fired when a automod is fired under a message

name: channelCreate
description: This event is fired when a channel is created

name: channelDelete
description: This event is fired when a channel is deleted

name: channelPinsUpdate
description: This event is fired when a channel's pins are updated

name: channelUpdate
description: This event is fired when a channel is updated

name: debug
description: This event is fired when discord.js sends out debug info

name: emojiCreate
description: This event is fired when an emoji is created

name: emojiDelete
description: This event is fired when an emoji is deleted

name: emojiUpdate
description: This event is fired when an emoji is updated

name: error
description: This event is fired when an error happens on the client

name: guildAuditLogEntryCreate
description: This event is fired when a guild audit log entry is created

name: guildBanAdd
description: This event is fired when a member is banned from the guild

name: guildBanRemove
description: This event is fired when a member is unbanned from a guild

name: guildCreate
description: This event is fired when the bot is added to a guild

name: guildDelete
description: This event is fired when a guild is deleted

name: guildMemberAdd
description: This event is fired when a member joins the guild

name: guildMemberRemove
description: This event is fired when a member leaves, is kicked or banned from a guild

name: guildMemberUpdate
description: This event is fired when a member is updated in a guild

name: guildUpdate
description: This event is fired when a guild updates their settings

name: interactionCreate
description: This event is fired every time a user uses a slash command, context menu, button, etc

name: inviteCreate
description: This event is fired when an invite is created

name: inviteDelete
description: This event is fired when an invite is deleted

name: messageCreate
description: This event is fired when someone sends a message

name: messageDelete
description: This event is fired when a message is deleted

name: messageDeleteBulk
description: This event is fired when a row of messages is deleted

name: messageReactionAdd
description: This event is fired when a reaction is added

name: messageReactionRemove
description: This event is fired when a user stops reacting

name: messageReactionRemoveAll
description: This event is fired when all emojis are removed from a message's reactions

name: messageReactionRemoveEmoji
description: This event is fired when a emoji is removed from a message's reactions

name: messageUpdate
description: This event is fired when a message is updated

name: presenceUpdate
description: This event is fired when a presence is updated

name: ready
description: This event is fired when the bot becomes ready

name: roleCreate
description: This event is fired when a role is created

name: roleDelete
description: This event is fired when a role is deleted

name: roleUpdate
description: This event is fired when a role is updated

name: shardDisconnect
description: This event is fired when a shard is disconnected

name: shardError
description: This event is fired when a shard throws an error

name: shardReady
description: Event is executed when a shard of this bot becomes ready

name: shardReconnecting
description: This event is fired when a shard starts reconnecting

name: shardResume
description: This event is fired when a shard starts resuming

name: stageInstanceCreate
description: This event is fired when a stage is created

name: stageInstanceDelete
description: This event is fired when a stage is deleted

name: stageInstanceUpdate
description: This event is fired when a stage is updated

name: stickerCreate
description: This event is fired when an sticker is created

name: stickerDelete
description: This event is fired when an sticker is deleted

name: stickerUpdate
description: This event is fired when an sticker is updated

name: threadCreate
description: This event is fired when a thread is created

name: threadDelete
description: This event is fired when a thread is deleted

name: threadMemberUpdate
description: This event is fired when a thread member is updated in a guild

name: threadUpdate
description: This event is fired when a thread is updated

name: typingStart
description: This event is fired when a user starts typing

name: userUpdate
description: This event is fired when a user updates their profile

name: voiceStateUpdate
description: This event is fired when a user joins/leaves a voice channel
